Auth.title: Sign in to BurnWatch
Auth.subtitle: Enter your email and we'll send you a magic link. No passwords, just secure access to your workspace.
Auth.magicLinkSent: Magic link sent. Check your inbox to continue.
Auth.disclaimer: By signing in, you agree to keep your cloud credentials safe. BurnWatch will only use read-only access to monitor spend on your behalf.

Callback.title: Finishing sign-in
Callback.confirmingSession: Confirming your session. This may take a moment...
Callback.noSession: No active session found. Try requesting a new magic link.
Callback.authFailed: Failed to finalize authentication. Please try again later.

Onboarding.title: Create your workspace
Onboarding.subtitle: Before you start tracking spend, we need to create your Organization (workspace). This step is required.
Onboarding.avatarHint: Used in headers/sidebars. You can change this later.
Onboarding.workspaceCreated: Workspace created. Redirecting to your dashboard...
Onboarding.footer: BurnWatch will use this Organization as the primary container for your cloud accounts, spend data and alerts.
Onboarding.nameRequired: First name and last name are required.
Onboarding.createFailed: Failed to create organization. Please try again.
Onboarding.unableToLoadUser: Unable to load authenticated user for avatar.

Dashboard.title: BurnWatch Dashboard (placeholder)
Dashboard.signedInMessage: You're signed in. This dashboard will show spend, projections and anomalies in the next milestones.
